p: Since the new houses do not follow the practices of the colonial era, new problems appeared. For instance, migration or displacement caused by political, social, and economic problems or natural disasters contributes to overcrowded spaces with restricted areas to live, where the constructions have sanitary deficiencies, promoting the transmission of respiratory or infectious diseases [ 2]. According to [ 3], deficient houses are those that do not properly protect from sicknesses, accidents, and even mortal danger.
